properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 9:32PM CST until February 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lubbock TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Light snow tonight with the potential for some sleet and
freezing rain to mix with the snow Tuesday and Tuesday night.
Snow accumulations up to 2 inches are expected with the
possibility of ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...Floyd, Lubbock and Crosby Counties.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Area roadways are expected to become slick with snow
and ice. Travel may become hazardous.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Delay travel if
possible.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY
